org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl

Class TextLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.LowLevelTextObject
      • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl.TextLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, ContentObject, LowLevelTextContainer, TextContent, TextContentVariants, TextObject, GeometricObject, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable, org.primaresearch.labels.HasLabels

    public class TextLine
extends LowLevelTextObject
implements LowLevelTextContainer
    Specialised low level text object representing text lines within a page layout.
    Author:
    clc

      • composeText

        public java.lang.String composeText(boolean replaceTextContent,
                                    boolean recursive)
        Description copied from interface: LowLevelTextContainer
        Composes the text for this object using the child text objects.
        Specified by:
        composeText in interface LowLevelTextContainer
        Parameters:
        replaceTextContent - If set to true the text content of this object will be replaced by the composed text (only if the composed text is not empty)
        recursive - If set to true all lower levels of text objects are used for the composition
        Returns:
        Composed text
